PRINCIPAL CONSULTANT
Executive Profile
A dynamic strategic leader that translates operations and business strategies into maximum profits commensurate with the best interest of shareholders, customers, employees, and the community.
An expert in consumer and mortgage lending dedicated to enhancing profitability by streamlining operational platforms, developing new markets, drafting strategic lending initiatives, growing a high-quality loan portfolio and regulating and managing risk.
Extremely analytical and knowledgeable of mortgage banking compliance and regulations with proven track record of applying controls to manage risk.
Dedicated to maintaining a reputation built on quality, service, and uncompromising ethics.
